title: does LoL download save progress?
body: Hey guys, I struggle to be online long enough to fully download the game at 13GB in one go and was wondering if the download progress gets saved?

replies.body: I also have this problem, downloading and saving files on the go seems pretty basic, and the old client used to do it. Why dosent the new client do the same. I've been trying to get back into the game for a while now and summer is goingggg

The patcher will want to get you up to date in a single swoop!  Closing it too soon can cause the patcher to restart the whole process again, as it would need to check for corruption resulting from the termination.  Let me know if that clears things up!
is there a point where it will save (30%, 50% etc) or does it all have to be done in one go?
